about_the_game:
Join our official Discord

Click the link on the right to join DISCORD!

Will you escape with gold and power?

Or fall to the Shadows of Chroma Tower?

Survive by means of steel, wit or magic

Defeat the Archmage's minions, plunder their riches, discover the secrets within the Tower and escape with your life! Do it the way you prefer:

  • Play by yourself or with friends, with or without PvP.

  • 5 classes, each with their own skills, talent tree and specialized subclasses.

  • 6 professions for you to master - from fishing to weapon forging.

  • Several difficulties for you to challenge yourself and test your gear and skills.

  • Hordes, mini-bosses, bosses and raids to fight alone or with up to 9 friends.

    Choose your Faction and conquer the Tower
    Whether playing by yourself, with friends or against other players, you will always be contributing to the bigger picture.

  • Factions and Territories - Will you fight the will of the Archmage as a Purist? Or will you join the Chromatists and try to harness the chromatic magic for yourself?

  • Escaping, defeating bosses, and many other actions grant your faction control over portions of the Tower, granting characters many different bonuses and advantages.

  • Join collective efforts to drive back the forces of the Archmage, eventually reaching his lair atop the Chroma Tower.

  • Player driven economy based on crafting, gathering and trading. Discover powerful recipes and level up your crafting professions to provide your friends - or potential buyers - with top-tier builds.

    Challenge yourself - the bigger the challenge, the better the loot
    As you climb the tower, you'll find new, more powerful minions and enhanced versions of the previous ones. They carry better items for you to use, better materials for you to craft with and more treasures for you to sell!

  • Start out with poorly made equipment, improvised from rural tools, and find better weapons and armor from all around the world - and even different worlds - within the Tower.

  • Fight, trade or craft your way to being able to decimate hordes of enemies with a flick of the wrist.

  • Choose your own difficulty - are you on a slow day and just want to have something to do? That's fine. Want to get friends together and challenge a floor filled with elites and mini-bosses? We've got something for you too.

  • Unlock your potential - As you level up, unlock new classes, crafting recipes, profession skills, difficulties and maps.

    Join or create a Guild and challenge the Archmage in 10-player raids

  • Climb the Tower, visiting the many different biomes it has assimilated from different places and dimensions - it's bigger on the inside!

  • Find access to the Lairs - Three huge bosses guard the Tower Top. Raid their lairs with up to 9 other players for a chance at facing the Archmage and breaking the Maldichroma curse.

  • Coordinate with your Guild, contributing resources, completing challenges and purchasing Guild Perks that grant all members perks and bonuses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 8th Generation i5 2.2GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060 or superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 11th Generation i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3060ti or superior
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Fight, loot, craft, level up and escape with your life! Shadows of Chroma Tower mixes together the best features of Dungeon Crawlers with ARPGs. Choose between steel, wit and magic to face hordes of enemies and huge bosses and unveil the secrets of the Chroma Tower.
